search.query: |inputlookup ctf_questions | search Number=$Number$ | eval hide=len(Link) | search hide > 0

index=scoreboard user=$env:user$ Number=$Number$ | stats count as Attempts, max(BasePointsAvailable) as BasePointsAvailable max(BasePointsAwarded) as BasePointsAwarded, max(SpeedBonusAwarded) as SpeedBonusAwarded, max(AdditionalBonusAwarded) as AdditionalBonusAwarded, sum(Penalty) as Penalty sum(HintPenalty) as HintPenalty count(eval(Result=="Incorrect")) as IncorrectAttempts, count(eval(Result=="Correct")) as CorrectAttempts by Number | gethints | eval Status = if(Attempts = 0,"Unanswered", Status) | eval Status = if(IncorrectAttempts > 0, "Incorrect", Status) | eval Status = if(CorrectAttempts > 0, "Correct", Status) | fields - Hints, IncorrectAttempts, CorrectAttempts, Attempts | fillnull value=0 | Table Number, Status, BasePointsAvailable, BasePointsAwarded, AdditionalBonusAwarded, SpeedBonusAwarded, Penalty, HintPenalty, HintsAvailable, HintsReceived | rename BasePointsAvailable as "Base Points Avail." | rename AdditionalBonusAwarded as "Additional Bonus" | rename BasePointsAwarded as "Base Points Earned" | rename SpeedBonusAwarded as "Speed Bonus" | rename HintPenalty as "Hint Penalty" | rename BonusPointsEarned as "Bonus Points Earned" | rename Penalty as "Penalty Points" | rename HintsAvailable as "Hints Available" | rename HintsReceived as "Hints Received"

ul.li: See the hints your team has purchased below. If you see Your team has not purchased this hint yet! you can click the hint to purchase it.
If you see 'No results found.' below it means there are simply no hints for this question. Good luck!

search.query: index="scoreboard_admin" user=$env:user$ Number=$Number$ | gethints | stats values(Hints) as Hints by Number | mvexpand Hints | spath input=Hints | eval Number=mvdedup(Number) | fields Number HintNumber HintCost Hint | sort Number HintNumber | rename HintCost as "Hint Cost"
